00009 #ifndef __PADSTATE_H__
00010 #define __PADSTATE_H__
00011 
00012 //---------------------------------------------------------
00013 //   PadState
00014 //    keyboard & pad note entry state
00015 //---------------------------------------------------------
00016 
00017 struct PadState {
00018       bool dot;
00019       int len;
00020       int tickLen;  // len + len * (dot ? .5 : 0)
00021       bool rest;
00022       int pad;
00023       int voice;
00024       int pitch;
00025       int prefix;
00026       bool tie;
00027 
00028 //    0 - no prefix
00029 //    1 - sharp
00030 //    2 - flat
00031 //    3 - double sharp
00032 //    4 - double flat
00033 //    5 - natural
00034 //    6 - (sharp)          11 - [sharp]
00035 //    7 - (flat)           12 - [flat]
00036 //    8 - (double sharp)   13 - [double sharp]
00037 //    9 - (double flat)    14 - [double flat]
00038 //    10 - (natural)       15 - [natural]
00039       };
00040 
00041 extern PadState padState;
00042 
00043 #endif
